content: परिग्रह् {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To clasp round, embrace. {@--2@} To encircle; surround, fence or hedge round. {@--3@} To lay hold of, seize. {@--4@} To take, assume. {@--5@} To accept. {@--6@} To favour, patronize; देवेन च परिगृहीतः <ls>M. 1</ls>; <ls n="M.">1. 13.</ls> {@--7@} To support, assist, guide; राक्षसमतिपरिगृहीतः <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--8@} To put on (a dress). {@--9@} To take possession of, master, overpower. {@--10@} To conceive, comprehend. {@--11@} To undertake. {@--12@} To receive hospitably. {@--13@} To take (a wife), marry; <ls>Ś. 5. 19.</ls> {@--14@} To conform to, follow. {@--15@} To surpass, excel.
